I did the same for you, got your profile page but again all I could do is ask you to be my friend.. I don't see where I could leave you a message... It's that "new" fix they got going; we're all a bit stewed over this BUT we have been assured that we will like the new look. We'll see. Guess all you can do is SHOUT real loud and wait till the mod in question answers you. One Flag......One Heart......One Nation............EVERMORE

title: HELP, please

content: quote: Originally posted by GunnyRet03: quote: Originally posted by mainedawg: quote: Originally posted by GunnyRet03: It's rigged to make it difficult to contact anyone... Ahhhhhh, try looking over my avatar............. Try being a Moderator and want to talk with a Member here. I can see the 1000 friens I would have. Did I say the mods created this 'Goat Rope? The concept is asinine. And one of the few things that everyone here agrees sux pizzer water. Gunny, they are trying to make it similar to what you would fiend on myspace or facebook. On those sites you cannot see somebody's profile until you become a friend of theirs. I believe that they are trying to get away from people calling people out on their profile page before you get to know them a bit. But, I personally like being able to view people's profile. It helps me decide whether or not I even want to get to know them. Obviously, people that had the same job as me or that were stationed in the same place, I would prefer to be cooler with them than somebody with no military experience at all. Karlhungusjr is an example of somebody that I don't get into too many arguments with, only because he has an IUSS badge as his avatar. God knows that he and I don't see eye to eye that much. But, I was a Sonar Tech and did TAD at an IUSS station for a while.

The concept is asinine. And one of the few things that everyone here agrees sux pizzer water.
reply: Gunny, they are trying to make it similar to what you would fiend on myspace or facebook. On those sites you cannot see somebody's profile until you become a friend of theirs. I believe that they are trying to get away from people calling people out on their profile page before you get to know them a bit. But, I personally like being able to view people's profile. It helps me decide whether or not I even want to get to know them. Obviously, people that had the same job as me or that were stationed in the same place, I would prefer to be cooler with them than somebody with no military experience at all. Karlhungusjr is an example of somebody that I don't get into too many arguments with, only because he has an IUSS badge as his avatar. God knows that he and I don't see eye to eye that much. But, I was a Sonar Tech and did TAD at an IUSS station for a while.
